Package jcommon.extract

Interface Summary
IResourceCallback Called when extraction has completed.
IResourceFilter Accepts or rejects a library or file being loaded/extracted.
IResourcePackage Interface that describes a series of resources for extraction.
IResourcePackage.IVisitor  
IResourceProcessor Classes that implement this interface are responsible for being able to load themselves through the IResourceProcessor.load(IResourcePackage, javax.xml.xpath.XPath, org.w3c.dom.Node, org.w3c.dom.Document, IVariableProcessor, ResourceProcessorFactory) method and then perform extraction or processing in the IResourceProcessor.process(String, IResourcePackage, IResourceFilter, IResourceProgressListener) method.
IResourceProgressListener Allows interested parties to be notified of resource extraction progress.
IVariableProcessor Holds and processes variables.
Registry.IVisitor  
 

Class Summary
DefaultResourceProcessor Default implementation of a resource processor.
DefaultVariableProcessor Holds variables, their values, and processes strings replacing variables with.
Package  
Reference  
Registry Maintains list of resource collections and their references to other resource collections.
ResourceCallback<T> Implements IResourceCallback and provides genericized parameters for convencience.
ResourceCallbackChain<T> Implements IResourceCallback and provides genericized parameters for convencience.
ResourceProcessorFactory Maintains a list of available resource processors and is responsible for creating new ones from a
ResourceProgressListenerAdapter Adapter for IResourceProgressListener.
Resources Reads a simple XML file that describes files to be extracted.
ResourceUtils Utility class.
VariableProcessorFactory Factory for creating variable processors that evaluate variables when extracting resources.
 

Exception Summary
MissingResourceException Exception regarding a missing resource for extraction and/or loading.
MissingResourceReferenceException Exception regarding resource extraction and/or loading.
MissingVariableException A variable was reference that has not been defined.
ResourceException Exception regarding resource extraction and/or loading.
ResourceUnavailableException Exception regarding resource extraction and/or loading.
 

Annotation Types Summary
ResourceProcessor Marks a class as something that can process and load resources.
